Title: Delete - Confirmation Modal Board View
Description: Verify confirmation modal appears when deleting task in Board View
Preconditions: User is logged in and has a task

Title: Delete - Confirmation Modal Board View
Steps: Hover over task and click delete button.
Expected Result: Delete confirmation modal appears with task title, message, 'Yes, Delete' and 'Cancel' buttons.

Title: Delete - Cancel Deletion Board View
Description: Verify user can cancel deletion in Board View
Preconditions: User is logged in, task exists, delete modal is open

Title: Delete - Confirm Deletion Board View
Description: Verify user can confirm task deletion in Board View
Preconditions: User is logged in, task exists, delete modal is open
Expected Result: 1. Modal closes.\n2. Task is removed from board.

Title: Delete - Close Modal X Button Board View
Description: Verify X button closes modal without deleting in Board View
Preconditions: User is logged in, task exists, delete modal is open

Title: Delete - Confirmation Modal Tree View
Description: Verify confirmation modal appears when deleting task in Tree View
Preconditions: User is logged in and has a task
Steps: Create a task and switch to Tree View.
Expected Result: Tree View active with task visible.

Title: Delete - Confirmation Modal Tree View
Steps: Click menu button and select Delete.
Expected Result: Delete confirmation modal appears with task title and confirmation message.

Title: Delete - Cancel Deletion Tree View
Description: Verify user can cancel deletion in Tree View
Preconditions: User is logged in, task exists, delete modal is open
Expected Result: 1. Modal closes.\n2. Task remains in tree.

Title: Delete - Confirm Deletion Tree View
Description: Verify user can confirm task deletion in Tree View
Preconditions: User is logged in, task exists, delete modal is open
Expected Result: 1. Modal closes.\n2. Task is removed from tree.

Title: Delete - i18n Spanish
Description: Verify delete confirmation works with Spanish language
Preconditions: User is logged in with Spanish language selected
Steps: Create task and attempt to delete in Board View.
Expected Result: Confirmation modal displays Spanish text: '¿Eliminar Tarea?', '¿Estás seguro...?', 'Sí, Eliminar', 'Cancelar'.
